title: 3 BHK Independent Builder Floor in Sector 83, Faridabad
description: Godrej builder floors in faridabad are residential homes developed by godrej properties in one of the citys emerging neighbourhoods, offering a blend of modern design, functional space and township-Style living. These low-Rise independent floors are created with thoughtful layouts that include well-Proportioned living and dining areas, comfortable bedrooms, practical kitchens, balconies and designated parking, making them suitable for families and professionals seeking a balanced lifestyle. Situated within a planned community, the environment around the floors features wide internal roads, landscaped green areas, parks and basic infrastructure that support everyday convenience and a neighbourhood feel. The location benefits from good road connectivity to key parts of faridabad and the wider national capital region, which makes daily commuting and travel to work or educational hubs straightforward. Social infrastructure in the vicinity has been steadily developing, with neighbourhood markets and retail areas close by where daily needs such as groceries, pharmacies and eateries can be accessed without long travel. Reputed schools offering education from primary through senior secondary levels are located within a short drive, catering to families with children and contributing to a supportive community setting. Healthcare facilities including multi-Speciality hospitals and medical centres are also available in the nearby area, ensuring access to quality medical care and emergency services. Overall, godrej builder floors in faridabad offer the advantages of independent living within a planned and connected neighbourhood, combining practical home design with access to essential amenities that support daily life.

title: 3 BHK Independent Builder Floor in Sector 83, Faridabad
description:
Established in 1897, the godrej group has its roots in india's independence and swadeshi movement. Our founder, ardeshir godrej, a lawyer-Turned-Serial entrepreneur failed with a few ventures before he struck gold with a locks business.

Today, we enjoy the patronage of 1.1 billion consumers globally across consumer goods, real estate, appliances, agriculture and many other businesses. In fact, our geographical footprint extends beyond earth, with our engines now powering many of india's space missions.

With a revenue of over usd 6 billion, we are growing fast, and have exciting, ambitious aspirations.

But for us, it is most important that besides our strong financial performance and innovative, much-Loved products, we remain a good company. Approximately 23 per cent of the promoter holding in the godrej group is held in trusts that invest in the environment, health and education. We are also bringing together our passion and purpose to make a difference through our good & green strategy of 'shared value' to create a more inclusive and greener india.

At the heart of all of this is our people. We take much pride in fostering an inspiring workplace, with an agile and high-Performance culture. We are also deeply committed to recognizing and valuing diversity across our teams.
